data.title: CONTEST: Are You An Expert On LLanview Trivia? Win a Copy of Between Heaven and Hell: OLTL Tribute Book!
data.meta_description: One Life to Life fans,  On-Air On-Soaps is giving you an opportunity to show us your knowledge of your beloved soap in our new trivia contest launching tonight!  If you answer all ten of our questions correctly and you are one of the first three to post them in the Comment Section attached to this […]
data.text:
By

One Life to Life fans, On-Air On-Soaps is giving you an opportunity to show us your knowledge of your beloved soap in our new trivia contest launching tonight! If you answer all ten of our questions correctly and you are one of the first three to post them in the Comment Section attached to this news post, you will receive a copy of Soap Opera Unsensored‘s, Nelson Branco’s new book, Between Heaven and Hell: OLTL Tribute Book.

The new in-depth look at Llanview and its rich history takes a look at: Best Love Stories, Worst Couples, Best Storylines, Worst Storylines, Best Characters, Best Villains, Best Recasts, Best Head Writer, Best Executive Producer, Biggest Hair Models, Best Moments/Cliffhangers, Best Younger Actors, Daytime Emmy Wins, Best Location Shoots, Asa Buchanan’s Best Wives, Biggest Scene-Stealers, Sexiest Men, Most Beautiful Women, Famous Alums, and much more.

Between Heaven and Hell also has past and present Interviews with OLTL alumni and stars: Andrea Evans, Judith Light, Nathan Fillion, Paul Rauch, Trevor St. John, Robin Strasser, Kassie De Paiva, Susan Haskell, Agnes Nixon, Michael Easton, Ilene Kristen, Brett Claywell, Scott Evans, Kristen Alderson, Brandon Buddy, Scott Clifton, Farah Fath, Forbes March, John Brotherton, Michael Malone and Josh Griffith. Between Heaven and Hell: OLTL Tribute Book can be purchased for $9.99 by clicking here.

Now below put on your thinking caps and try to answer our OLTL trivia! Make sure to number your answers in the Comment section 1 through 10 to correspond to the questions. We will notify the winners by email, and you will have 48 hours to respond with your mailing address. If we do not hear back from you, the prize will default to the next person with all the correct answers who posted them the earliest! Good-Luck!

1. Name all of Viki’s husbands in order.

2. Which real-life person inspired Agnes Nixon’s Carla Grey storyline?

3. Who was Asa Buchanan’s first wife?

4. Which character was Bo Buchanan designed to be a love interest for with when the Buchanan stud was first introduced?

5. True or False: Agnes Nixon wrote a real-life Banner article on sexual diseases for One Life viewers to read which was incorporated into the show with Cathy Craig as its author.

6. Which year did One Life to Live expand to one hour?

7. Which real-life city suburb was Llanview modeled after?

8. Name every actress who played Tina Clayton Lord Roberts.

9. While she was married to Hank Gannon who did Nora Hanen have an affair with?

10. Name the first younger man Dorian had an affair with in a May-December romance?

General Hospital

Two Charged With Murder In Fatal Shooting of ‘General Hospital’ Alum Johnny Wactor

By

On Monday, during a press conference held by Los Angeles County prosecutors, two of the four suspects in the death of Johnny Wactor (ex-Brando Corbin) have now been officially charged with the murder of the beloved General Hospital actor.

The charges were announced by L.A. County District Attorney George Gascón and interim police chief Dominic Choi. The suspects charged with Wactor’s murder are Robert Barceleau and Sergio Estrada, both 18.

The most serious charge is for Barceleau, who was charged with murder, including a special circumstance allegation of killing in the commission of a robbery, which could lead to a life-without-parole prison term. He was also charged with attempted robbery and grand theft, both with allegations he was armed with a firearm.

Estrada, was also charged with murder, but without the special circumstance allegation. He was also charged with attempted robbery and grand theft, both also allegedly while armed with a firearm. Estrada is also facing a life sentence.

The two other suspects were also formally charged, Leonel Gutierrez, also 18 was charged with attempted robbery and grand theft by embezzlement, both with allegations he was armed. Meanwhile, Frank Olano, 22, was charged with being an accessory after the fact to the killing, along with receiving stolen property and three counts of being a felon in possession of a firearm. Barceleau, Estrada and Gutierrez remain in custody in lieu of $2 million bail each, while Olano must post a $1 million bail.

Wactor was killed May 25 in the early morning hours in downtown Los Angeles after his shift as a bartender at the Level 8 bar/restaurant. He, and co-worker, Anita Joy were walking to their cars, when Wactor came upon the thieves trying to steal the catalytic converter from his vehicle and was shot in the chest and died in Joy’s arms.

So, are you glad Johnny’s murderers have been officially charged? Share your thoughts via the comment section below. But first, you can check out the press conference from Fox 11 Los Angeles.

News

Linda Dano and Alicia Coppola Pay Tribute to ‘Another World’ Co-Star, John Aprea

By

On Sunday, the world learned of the passing of veteran actor, John Aprea who died back on August 5th at the age of 83.

Aprea appeared on Another World in two roles throughout his career – Lucas (Luke) Castigliano from 1989 to 1993, and Alexander Nikos from May 1997 to January 1998.

In story, Lucas was one of the loves of Felicia Gallant’s (Linda Dano) life. They shared a daughter that was put up for adoption when they were younger, who was later revealed to be Lorna Devon played by Alicia Coppola.

On Monday, August 19th, following the news of his death, both Linda and Alicia shared their remembrances of their time working with the talented actor.

Linda Dano took to her Instagram and expressed, “As many of you already know my dear friend John Aprea passed away on August 5th…out of respect to his wife Betsy I waited until the family released there statement.. before I posted anything.This has been a very difficult time…I loved him so…The kindest sweetest funniest man.I believe he is now in Heaven with all of his old friends and of coarse ,my Frank…God has his hands full!!!Bless you John …I miss you ❤️”

Alicia Coppola shared on her Instagram: “Now I have two fathers in heaven. I adored you John Aprea. Mama Linda Dano and I will always miss you. You were there for me to grieve my very own daddy. Art imitated life. I loved you then. I love you now. Hope you, my daddy and Frankie are giving God a run for His money. With beer, blonds with big boobs. Xoxo”

Coppola appeared as Lorna from 1991-1994, while Linda Dan0 played Felicia from 1983-1999 and until AW’s final episode.

Do you remember Alicia, John and Linda’s scenes together from ‘Another World’? Share your remembrances via the comment section below.

News

Jökull Júliusson, Iceland Rock Star, to Appear on The Bold and the Beautiful

By

Keeping with their international reach and flair, CBS’ The Bold and the Beautiful is bringing Iceland’s top rock star to the series in a special appearance.

Jökull Júliusson, who is the frontman of the band Kaleo, will tape his episode today at the B&B soundstages. In the story, Júliusson will play himself and perform his hit song, “Way Down We Go.”

Look for the episode featuring the musical performance to air on September 27th on the soap opera. According to Deadline, “Júliusson was approached about making a cameo last year by a B&B producer while both were attending an Andrea Bocelli concert.”

As B&B viewers know, Andrea Bocelli performed on the soap in an episode that aired in June of 2023 when the show went to Rome, Italy for a remote.

Last week, Y&R’s Michael Damian performed his “Rock On” Remix version in the living room at the Forrester Mansion when Danny and Christine (Lauralee Bell) dropped in to Los Angeles from Danny’s world tour.

The Bold and the Beautiful is no stranger to bringing other recording acts on to the show when Lil Nas X did a cameo as a waiter, Usher played the role of Raymond, and American Idol alum Constantine Maroulis played the role of Constantine Parros.

Meanwhile, while in Los Angeles, Júliusson will also appear on the Tuesday, August 20th episode of late night’s Jimmy Kimmel Live! and will perform a concert at The Troubadour on Wednesday night August 21st which is already sold out.

What do you think about Jökull Júliusson coming to The Bold and the Beautiful? Let us know in the comment section. And if you don’t know his music, watch the video for his song with Kaleo,”Way Down We Go” below.
